About

Hey, this is Hux.

写写代码，做做设计，看看产品。
世界那么大，我想去看看。

Hey，我是黄玄，程序员 & 设计师，前淘宝网 · 阿里旅行前端团队资深实习生 · 花名鬼栈，前微影时代 · 微票儿前端基础工程团队负责人。

一些作品和开源项目，👉 戳 演说.io、Portfolio 与 Github；除了在博客与 知乎专栏 · 一生想做浪漫极客 写点东西外，我也是 GDG 字幕组 与 前端外刊评论 · 知乎专栏 的翻译维护成员。

Yet another Frontend Engineer.
Yet another Lifelong Designer.

Hi, I am Huang Xuan(黄玄)，you can call me Hux. I'm an engineer & a designer who loves to build software such as Yanshuo.io and more (Portfolio 👉 and Github 👉). I studied Digital Media Art and graduated from Communication University of China in 2016.

As an engineer, I worked at Wepiao (see CrunchBase) as the dev lead of Front-End Infrastructure Team, and used to intern at Alibaba Trip for one year. As a designer, I was offered to be the UI/UX Designer Intern of Alibaba, Microsoft etc.

Moreover, I'm also a translator at GDG China Subtitle Team, maintainer at Frontend Magazine and the owner of Lifelong Romantic Geek.
